literalstring.name: The combination of strong authentication, access control, data encryption, and verification mechanisms significantly reduces the risk of unauthorized traffic thereby reducing the likelihood of a "CAPEC-594: Traffic Injection" type attack.
literalstring.text: The combination of strong authentication, access control, data encryption, and verification mechanisms significantly reduces the risk of unauthorized traffic thereby reducing the likelihood of a "CAPEC-594: Traffic Injection" type attack.
